: : Darkangel : :

Darkangel could have sworn there was a twinkle in her optic when she 
said that.

Darkangel: We'll contact Tripredacus Command on Cybertron. I have a 
friend who I know will come and maybe he'll bring a few friends with 
him.

The bat bot finally arrives at the Tripred base. Despite his damage, 
he walks right bast the CR chambers and to the main communcication 
room. He sets up a subspace channel to Cybertron.

Darkangel: Tripredacus Command, this is Darkangel of the prehistoric 
Earth bound forces. I am officialy requesting reinforcements. I 
personally request Air Commander DeathStar. I await your reply. 
Darkangel out.

The message is ebamed over the subspace signal through the time warp 
and to the Transformers home world of Cybertron.

OOC: Ok if anyone wants some new charrs and would like them to be 
Tripreds here is your chance. I'll be bringing in DeathStar who will 
have the design of Machine Wars Starscream.
